definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
lit. willow scent and mist of blossom (idiom); scene full of the delights of spring

woman/prostitute/lovemaking/literary or theatrical form in Tang, Song and Yuan

sentences.english: Fireworks welcomed the new year in moscow's red square.
sentences.chinese: 人們在莫斯科紅場燃放煙花慶祝新年。

sentences.english: Safety glasses should be worn when setting off fireworks and sparklers.
sentences.chinese: 應戴安全眼鏡時燃放煙花爆竹和煙花。

sentences.english: Safety glasses should be worn when setting off fireworks and sparklers.
sentences.chinese: 應戴安全眼鏡時燃放煙花爆竹和煙花。

sentences.english: The black lift powder at the base catapults the shell into the air.
sentences.chinese: 底部起到推進作用的黑火藥負責將煙花殼送入空中。

sentences.english: We also get to set off fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 我們還要向套燃放煙花。

sentences.english: He said four camcorders had recorded the ignition process and firework display.
sentences.chinese: 他還提到四個攝像機拍到了煙花散開及起火的過程。

sentences.english: Others consider it harmful to set off fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 也有人認爲它有害於燃放煙花。

sentences.english: Many people lit fireworks as the church-goers passed by.
sentences.chinese: 在教徒們經過時，許多人點燃了煙花。

sentences.english: Handling more than one sparkler or firework at a time is not safe.
sentences.chinese: 在同一時間處理多個焰火或煙花並不安全。

sentences.english: A basic fireworks safety rule is to remain standing when using sparklers.
sentences.chinese: 煙花爆竹安全的一個基本規則是站立時，使用煙火。

sentences.english: It is forbidden to bring fireworks on board trains during Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 春運期間，禁止挾帶煙花爆竹上車。

sentences.english: The son rode in the trunk and enjoyed the fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 商人的兒子騎在他的飛箱上欣賞煙花。

sentences.english: They set off firecrackers and watch fireworks displays。
Catharine is always the key element of large gathering in China.
sentences.chinese: 煙花一直是中國大型晚會的關鍵要素。

sentences.english: Brilliant fireworks (or catharine) of many years.
In March, clouds permeating the hollow are typical in the south.
sentences.chinese: 滿谷煙雲，繚繞着江南的煙花三月。

definition: Victoria Harbor, Hong Kong/abbr. for 維多利亞港|维多利亚港[Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gang3]
colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)
to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
